languages.text: Reduces the enemy's Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill by −20. Grants allies affected by this ability a 30% reduction in all incoming damage, except damage of the Shock, Energy and Warp types and increases their Weapon Skill by 40.

traits.locale_text: Reduces the enemy's Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill by −20. Grants allies affected by this ability a 30% reduction in all incoming damage, except damage of the Shock, Energy and Warp types and increases their Weapon Skill by 40.

languages.text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).
languages.original_text: Существо издает свирепый рык. У противников в радиусе 3 клеток {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} уменьшаются на 20. У союзников в радиусе 3 клеток Ближний Бой увеличивается на 40, а получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} уменьшается на 30% (за исключением энергетического, электрического и {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}).

traits.locale_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less damage, except energy, shock, and warp damage.

У противников в радиусе 3 клеток {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} уменьшаются на 20. Существо издает свирепый рык. У противников в радиусе 3 клеток {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} уменьшаются на 20. У союзников в радиусе 3 клеток Ближний Бой увеличивается на 40, а получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} уменьшается на 30% (за исключением энергетического, электрического и {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}).

languages.text: Diese Kreatur stößt ein wildes Brüllen aus. Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern haben -20 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Die Waffenfähigkeit von Verbündeten in einem Radius von 3 Feldern erhöht sich um +40 und sie erleiden -30 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (gilt nicht für Energie-, Schock- und {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}).
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur stößt ein wildes Brüllen aus. Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern haben -20 auf ihre Ballistik-Fähigkeit und Waffenfähigkeit. Die Waffenfähigkeit von Verbündeten in einem Radius von 3 Feldern erhöht sich um +40 und sie erleiden -30 % weniger Schaden (gilt nicht für Energie-, Schock- und Warp-Schaden).

languages.text: Cette créature pousse un rugissement féroce. Les ennemis dans un rayon de 3 cases voient leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} réduites de −20. Les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases voient leur Capacité de combat augmentée de +40 et subissent 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins (hors dégâts d'énergie, d'électrocution et {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}du Warp{/g}).
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Cette créature pousse un rugissement féroce. Les ennemis dans un rayon de 3 cases voient leur Capacité de tir et leur Capacité de combat réduites de −20. Les alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases voient leur Capacité de combat augmentée de +40 et subissent 30 % de dégâts en moins (hors dégâts d'énergie, d'électrocution et du Warp).

languages.text: 发出凶暴的咆哮，距离3格以内所有敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低20点，距离3格以内所有盟友武器技能提高40点，受到的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低30%（能量伤害、电击伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}除外）。
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: 发出凶暴的咆哮，距离3格以内所有敌人弹道技能、武器技能降低20点，距离3格以内所有盟友武器技能提高40点，受到的伤害降低30%（能量伤害、电击伤害、亚空间伤害除外）。

languages.text: Esta criatura emite un rugido feroz. Los enemigos en un radio de 3 casillas sufren una reducción de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. Los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas obtienen un aumento de +40 a su Habilidad de armas y reciben un −30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} (no afecta al daño de energía, al de conmoción ni al {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}).
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura emite un rugido feroz. Los enemigos en un radio de 3 casillas sufren una reducción de −20 a su Habilidad de armas y Habilidad de proyectiles. Los aliados en un radio de 3 casillas obtienen un aumento de +40 a su Habilidad de armas y reciben un −30 % de daño (no afecta al daño de energía, al de conmoción ni al daño de disformidad).

languages.text: この生物は激しい咆哮を放つ。半径3セル以内の敵は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が-20低下する。半径3セル以内の味方は、その武器スキルが+40増加し、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が-30%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}は対象外）。
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: この生物は激しい咆哮を放つ。半径3セル以内の敵は、その弾道スキルと武器スキルが-20低下する。半径3セル以内の味方は、その武器スキルが+40増加し、受けるダメージが-30%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、ワープダメージは対象外）。
この生物は激しい咆哮を放つ。半径3セル以内の敵は、その弾道スキルと武器スキルが-20低下する。半径3セル以内の味方は、その武器スキルが+40増加し、受けるダメージが-30%低下する（エネルギー、ショック、ワープダメージは対象外）。

languages.text: Bu yaratık olanca gücüyle kükrer. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri 20'şer puan azalır. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin Silah Yeteneği nitelikleri 40 puan artarken %30 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirler (enerji, şok ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarını{/g} etkilemez).
languages.original_text: This creature lets out a fierce roar. Enemies within a 3-cell radius have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} reduced by −20. Allies within a 3-cell radius have their Weapon Skill increased by +40 and suffer −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (does not affect energy, shock, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık olanca gücüyle kükrer. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanların Balistik Yetenek ve Silah Yeteneği nitelikleri 20'şer puan azalır. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin Silah Yeteneği nitelikleri 40 puan artarken %30 daha az hasar verirler (enerji, şok ve öteboyut hasarını etkilemez).

Bu yaratık olanca gücüyle kükrer. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri 20'şer puan azalır. 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin Silah Yeteneği nitelikleri 40 puan artarken %30 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirler (enerji, şok ve öteboyut hasarını etkilemez).
